Text: This is the man! He is the only one i trust when talking about Portable Apps. I have been using his portables since last year and didn't have any problems since then. Just one question about this PS, is it the x86-32 or x64 one? As it works on my x86 W7 i judge that it is the 32bit. Is there any plans on releasing a x64 version? Thanks man
Your Photoshop portables in PortableApps.com Format are great! Thank you.
